content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: magma_block
inventory=[{"type": "pink_terracotta", "quantity": 35, "index": 11}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "light_blue_dye", "quantity": 13, "index": 15}, {"type": "light_gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 21, "index": 18}, {"type": "target", "quantity": 63, "index": 28}, {"type": "ravager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 37, "index": 35}, {"type": "light_blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft magma_block, I need to place 4 magma_cream in a 2x2 grid in the crafting table. Therefore, I will move 1 magma_cream from slot 12 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: magma_block
inventory=[{"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "pink_terracotta", "quantity": 35, "index": 11}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "light_blue_dye", "quantity": 13, "index": 15}, {"type": "light_gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 21, "index": 18}, {"type": "target", "quantity": 63, "index": 28}, {"type": "ravager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 37, "index": 35}, {"type": "light_blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: Since I already have 1 magma_cream in the crafting table, I will move another magma_cream from slot 12 to slot 2. This will place 2 magma_cream side by side in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: magma_block
inventory=[{"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "pink_terracotta", "quantity": 35, "index": 11}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "light_blue_dye", "quantity": 13, "index": 15}, {"type": "light_gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 21, "index": 18}, {"type": "target", "quantity": 63, "index": 28}, {"type": "ravager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 37, "index": 35}, {"type": "light_blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I have 2 magma_cream in the crafting table, I will move another magma_cream from slot 12 to slot 4. This will place 2 magma_cream side by side in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: magma_block
inventory=[{"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "pink_terracotta", "quantity": 35, "index": 11}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "light_blue_dye", "quantity": 13, "index": 15}, {"type": "light_gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 21, "index": 18}, {"type": "target", "quantity": 63, "index": 28}, {"type": "ravager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 37, "index": 35}, {"type": "light_blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I have 3 magma_cream in the crafting table, I will move the last magma_cream from slot 12 to slot 5. This will place 4 magma_cream in a 2x2 grid in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: magma_block
inventory=[{"type": "magma_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "pink_terracotta", "quantity": 35, "index": 11}, {"type": "light_blue_dye", "quantity": 13, "index": 15}, {"type": "light_gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 21, "index": 18}, {"type": "target", "quantity": 63, "index": 28}, {"type": "ravager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 37, "index": 35}, {"type": "light_blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I have crafted the magma_block, I will move it from the crafting table to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
